page.title: 14LIFE STYLES IN BUCHANAN
page.content: At 8 o'clock I get up. I get dressed then have my breakfast at about 8.20am. I make my juice for my packed lunch. I then sit around until 9 o'clock when I go outside and wait for the bus. The bus comes at 9.05. School starts at 9.30am. We have a break at 10.30 and start work again at 10.50. We have lunch at 12.00. We start work again at 13.00. We have another break at 14.30 and we come in at 14.50. We leave school at 15.30. When I get home at 15.45 I have a drink and do my homework. Next I change out of my school uniform and go and watch T.V. until 17.00 when I have my dinner. I have to wash the dishes and then I watch T.V. or I go outside and play until it is time to go to Guides. Guides start at 19.30. We do all sorts of things there. I go to bed at about 22.10.
